mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stats_page (page_id, page_name, size_of_posts_in_total, size_of_posts_has_keyword, size_of_posts_has_keyword_and_geo, size_of_comments_in_total, size_of_comments_has_keyword, size_of_comments_has_keyword_and_geo, size_of_replies_in_total, size_of_replies_has_keyword, size_of_replies_has_keyword_and_geo) VALUES (#{pageId}, #{pageName}, #{sizeOfPostsInTotal}, #{sizeOfPostsHasKeyword}, #{sizeOfPostsHasKeywordAndGeo}, #{sizeOfCommentsInTotal}, #{sizeOfCommentsHasKeyword}, #{sizeOfCommentsHasKeywordAndGeo}, #{sizeOfRepliesInTotal}, #{sizeOfRepliesHasKeyword}, #{sizeOfRepliesHasKeywordAndGeo});
